item.title: Ethiopia: Verifying the unblocking of websites
item.description:
Pro PM Abiy Ahmed Rally at Meskel Square, June 2018 - Photo by Berhan Taye

On 22nd June 2018, the Ethiopian government reported that it had unblocked 264 websites. This (great) news was also reported by ESAT, a major Ethiopian media website that was blockedÂ over the last years.
